AI Description: SZ3 is a high-performance data compression software designed for scientific data, with a focus on large-scale numerical simulations. It is optimized for compressing structured grid data commonly found in computational fluid dynamics and weather modeling applications.
Core Features: High-Performance Data Compression, Optimized For Large-Scale Numerical Simulations, Designed For Structured Grid Data, Suitable For Computational Fluid Dynamics & Weather Modeling Applications
General Tags: Data Compression, Scientific Data, Numerical Simulations, Computational Science
